TopicTitle: Keep on Trucking; a series of short videos

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I'm driving a rover to the North Pole of Kerbin and am going to youtube the journey as a series of short (~10 mins max) episodes.

Mainly doing it as an exercise to give me something to do/get up for, but thought why not record it as well.

Here's the first one!

http://youtu.be/vAFHks0SB4M

Please let me know anything I can improve on or what to talk about or whatever, I'd appreciate it very much. Thanks!

Here's Episode 2!

http://youtu.be/iL0TXMT3Bko

Thanks to everyone who watched the first one too!

Any tips or things to talk about? Thanks!

Episode 3 is ready, I hope people like it. If not, let me know why so I can change for the better!

http://youtu.be/1cTAawimUIE
